techmeme.title: A look at Google's HeAR, a bioacoustics healthcare AI model trained 300M sounds, including 100M cough sounds, to analyze users' coughs and detect tuberculosis (Saritha Rai/Bloomberg)

Analysts and industry execs say Nvidia's Blackwell engineering challenges stem from combining two new processors and several memory components in a single chip (Asa Fitch/Wall Street Journal)
Indian quick grocery delivery startup Zepto raises $340M at a $5B valuation, up from $3.6B in June 2024, in a round led by General Catalyst (Reuters)
